analyzed: 'jug / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni / rjes su rnam par dpyod /
translated: followed the inconceivable domain of the buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni /
translated: and contemplated the wisdom of the tathāgatas that penetrates the entire realm of phenomena.

original: rjes su rnam par sems /🔽sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la ni /
analyzed: rjes su rnam par sems / sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la ni /
translated: He contemplates the subsequent.

original: yang dag par blta /
analyzed: yang dag par blta /
translated: He sees the domain of the buddhas, which is equal to the unequaled.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi yul gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni /
translated: He enters the inconceivable domain of the methods of the tathāgatas.

original: 'jug / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni /🔽rtog / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa nam mkha' spyod yul du ni /
analyzed: 'jug / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyi ngo bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni / rtog / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa nam mkha' spyod yul du ni /
translated: He understands the essence of the buddhas’ entry into the single mode of the realm of phenomena.

original: yang dag par blta /
analyzed: yang dag par blta /
translated: He sees the buddhas, the bhagavats, who have no abode, whose domain is space.

original: chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' mtha' ma yin pa'i rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni /
translated: He is devoted to the entry into the nature of the unborn, which is the limit of reality.

original: mos / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni /🔽mngon par 'dod /
analyzed: mos / sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni / mngon par 'dod /
translated: He aspires to the buddhas’ unobstructed liberation.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa la ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / ther zug pa la ni /
translated: He is devoted to the buddhas’ bodies, which are permanent, peaceful, and eternal.

original: 'jug / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / @462a *//
analyzed: 'jug / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / @462a *//
translated: and the Tathāgata’s body pervades all the infinite buddhafields.

original: sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni /🔽'jug / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyi phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa med pa ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni / 'jug / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyi phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur yang thug pa med pa ni /
translated: He is present before all sentient beings.

original: rjes su dran par byed /
analyzed: rjes su dran par byed /
translated: He is the one who remembers the qualities of the blessed buddhas, which are inexhaustible even after eons.🔽He is the one who analyzes the nature of the realm of phenomena.”

original: chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa dpyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings nyid la rnam pa dpyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po yang cang mi smra bar gyur to //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva Pramuditarāja remained silent.

original: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te /
analyzed: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te /
translated: At that time, the venerable Rāṣṭrapāla had taken a vow to remain for three months during the rainy season in Śrāvastī.

original: de zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gsar bu las dang po rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing /
analyzed: de zla ba gsum 'das nas chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / gsar bu las dang po rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang lhan cig tu mthar gyis yul rgyu ba rgyu zhing /
translated: After three months had passed, he made his robes. When the robes were finished, he took his robes and bowl and, together with the saṅgha of monks and with young monks who had newly gone forth, he gradually traveled through the country.

original: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ngo //
analyzed: rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ngo //
translated: He went to the great city of Rājagṛha and to Vulture Peak Mountain.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
translated: Then the venerable Rāṣṭrapāla went to the Blessed One. When he arrived, he bowed his head at the Blessed One’s feet, circumambulated the Blessed One three times, and then sat down to one side.

original: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te tshigs su @462b bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do //
analyzed: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo sbyar te tshigs su @462b bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do //
translated: Having sat down to one side, the venerable Rāṣṭrapāla, with folded hands, praised the Blessed One with these verses:

original: mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mi mchog 'od mdzad pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: “I pay homage to the supreme human, the radiant one!

original: nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one whose mind is like space!

original: rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rgyal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Victorious One, the cutter of doubts!

original: srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: srid gsum mthar byon thub la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the Sage who has reached the end of the three existences!

original: zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byams kun tu yang //
analyzed: zhing rnams bye ba rab 'byams kun tu yang //
translated: In all the countless millions of realms,

original: 'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung //
analyzed: 'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung //
translated: the guides proclaim your praises.

original: rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing //
analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras kyis thos nas rab dga' zhing //
translated: Having heard them, the Victorious One's sons rejoice,

original: yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du mchi //
analyzed: yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchod du mchi //
translated: and come to make offerings to the Sage, the ocean of qualities.

original: bde gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod bgyis te //
analyzed: bde gshegs tshul dang mthun pas mchod bgyis te //
translated: Having made offerings in accordance with the Sugata's way,

original: thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas //
analyzed: thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas //
translated: and having heard the dust-free Dharma from the Great Sage,

original: de dag khyod kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing //
analyzed: de dag khyod kyi yon tan phreng brjod cing //
translated: they proclaim your garland of qualities,🔽and return to their own buddha realms.

original: yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi //
analyzed: yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi //
translated: And with a delighted mind, you will go to your own realm.

original: byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na //
analyzed: byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na //
translated: When you were seeking supreme, excellent enlightenment,

original: khyed kyi thugs ni skyo ba mi mnga' bar //
analyzed: khyed kyi thugs ni skyo ba mi mnga' bar //
translated: Your mind was never discouraged.

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su //
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su //
translated: For countless quintillions of eons,

original: sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad //
translated: You practiced for the sake of sentient beings.

original: 'dren pa khyod kyi sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad //
analyzed: 'dren pa khyod kyi sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad //
translated: Guide, you practiced generosity, discipline,

original: bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslab //
analyzed: bzod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslab //
translated: Patience, diligence, and concentration.

original: shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs //
analyzed: shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs //
translated: You perfected wisdom, means, and power.

original: des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: des na rnam 'dren che la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Therefore, I pay homage to the Great Guide.

original: rdzu 'phrul rkang dag mngon shes mchog la mkhas //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul rkang dag mngon shes mchog la mkhas //
translated: You were skilled in the bases of miraculous powers and the highest superknowledges.

original: dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslab //
analyzed: dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslab //
translated: You trained in the faculties, powers, and liberations.

original: sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs //
analyzed: sems can kun gyi spyod pa thugs chud rtogs //
translated: You understood and realized the conduct of all sentient beings.

original: mnyam med ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mnyam med ye shes gtso la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the unequaled chief of wisdom.

original: 'gro @463a *// ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen //
analyzed: 'gro @463a *// ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen //
translated: You thoroughly knew the mind-streams of beings.

original: spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang // tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba //
analyzed: spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang // tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol 'gyur ba //
translated: And the way of liberation through the gateway of discipline—

original: de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen //
analyzed: de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen //
translated: The Bhagavān, the supreme one among men, knows these.

original: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong //🔽gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang // gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las //
analyzed: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong // gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang // gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur ba'i las //
translated: He abandons the arising of desire, anger, and ignorance.🔽He knows the karma by which sentient beings go to the three lower realms🔽And by which they go to the happy realms.

original: 'gro bas legs bgyis pa dang nongs bgyis mkhyen //
analyzed: 'gro bas legs bgyis pa dang nongs bgyis mkhyen //
translated: He knows the good and bad actions of beings.🔽He knows all the sugatas of the past🔽Who have benefited beings and have been worshipped by gods and humans,

original: 'gro la phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang // de ltar lha dang mi yis mchod rnams dang // gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin //
analyzed: 'gro la phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang // de ltar lha dang mi yis mchod rnams dang // gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog mthar phyin //
translated: And those who have not yet come, who have perfected supreme qualities.

original: bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen //
analyzed: bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen //
translated: He knows them all.🔽He knows the pure realms, the perfect retinues,🔽The assemblies of bodhisattvas and hearers,

original: dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // byang chub sems dpa' tshogs dang nyan thos dang // drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad //
analyzed: dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // byang chub sems dpa' tshogs dang nyan thos dang // drang srong chen po rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad //
translated: And the lifespans of the great sages—

original: rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen //
analyzed: rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen //
translated: He knows them all without exception.

original: mya ngan 'das ni chos gnas ci 'dra dang // rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang // der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: mya ngan 'das ni chos gnas ci 'dra dang // rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang // der ni chos mdzod 'dzin pa ci 'dra ba //
translated: And what the holders of the treasury of the Dharma will be like,

original: de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen //
analyzed: de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen //
translated: The best of men knows all of this without exception.

original: dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi //
analyzed: dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi //
translated: The ten powers of knowledge of the three times always function

original: ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug /
analyzed: ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi mnga' 'jug /
translated: Without obstruction in your wisdom.

original: chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'//
analyzed: chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'//
translated: Your mind is unattached to all phenomena.

original: phyag 'tshal rgyal ba @463b ye shes mtsho khyod la //
analyzed: phyag 'tshal rgyal ba @463b ye shes mtsho khyod la //
translated: Homage to you, Victorious One, ocean of wisdom!

original: khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis rab tu lhag /
analyzed: khyod dang mtshungs mnyam ma mchis rab tu lhag /
translated: You are without equal, without compare, and most excellent.🔽Your body is adorned with the major marks,

original: skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' spras pa ltar //🔽mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab spras pa //
analyzed: skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' spras pa ltar // mtshan rnams kyis kyang sku ni rab spras pa //
translated: Like the sky is adorned with stars.

original: mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mi mchog thub pa mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, supreme among men, supreme sage!

original: gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi //
analyzed: gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi //
translated: Your form is incomparable and pleasing to the mind.

original: lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par bgyid //
analyzed: lhar bcas 'gro ba zil du rlag par bgyid //
translated: It outshines the worlds of gods and men.

original: tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha yi rnams //
analyzed: tshangs pa brgya byin 'og min lha yi rnams //
translated: Brahmā, Śakra, and the Akaniṣṭha gods

original: khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags //
analyzed: khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags //
translated: They are not beautiful in your presence.

original: khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'//
analyzed: khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'//
translated: You are free of stains, like a mountain of gold.

original: dbu snum 'jam zhing g-yas su 'khyil bar gnas //
analyzed: dbu snum 'jam zhing g-yas su 'khyil bar gnas //
translated: Your head is smooth, soft, and has hair that curls to the right.

original: lhun po'i rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags //
analyzed: lhun po'i rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags //
translated: Your crown protrudes like the king of mountains.

original: bsod nams rgya cher byung ba lham mer bzhugs //
analyzed: bsod nams rgya cher byung ba lham mer bzhugs //
translated: You shine with the radiance of vast merit.

original: 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing //
analyzed: 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing //
translated: You emit billions of light rays.

original: khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes //
analyzed: khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes //
translated: The hair between your eyebrows is beautiful.

original: 'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa //
analyzed: 'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa //
translated: Your eyes, which look upon beings with thoughts of compassion,

original: spyan ni autpal 'dra zhing yid du mchi //
analyzed: spyan ni autpal 'dra zhing yid du mchi //
translated: are like blue lotuses and are captivating.

original: zla nyi dri med mkha' la ji lta bar //
analyzed: zla nyi dri med mkha' la ji lta bar //
translated: Just like the stainless moon and sun in the sky,

original: rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lham me ste //
analyzed: rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lham me ste //
translated: your face, O Guide, shines

original: lha pa'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: lha pa'i skye bo ngoms par mi 'gyur ba //
translated: and delights the best of people.

original: zhal bzang mi yi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽ngan pa rma bya ri dvags rgyal gyi stabs //
analyzed: zhal bzang mi yi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo // ngan pa rma bya ri dvags rgyal gyi stabs //
translated: Homage to your beautiful face, O best of men!🔽Your gait is like that of a swan, a bull, or a lion.

original: glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis //
analyzed: glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis //
translated: You walk slowly with the gait of an arrogant elephant.

original: sa rnams g-yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa //
analyzed: sa rnams g-yo bar mdzad cing rab gshegs pa //
translated: And the earth quakes as you proceed.

original: stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, one of steadfast conduct, endowed with the ten powers!

original: phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum @464a *//
analyzed: phyag gi sor mo ring zhing zlum @464a *//
translated: Your fingers are long, round, and beautiful,

original: la mdzes // sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras //
analyzed: la mdzes // sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras //
translated: Your nails are copper-colored, pure, and webbed.

original: bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing sleb //
analyzed: bzhengs kyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing sleb //
translated: Even standing up, your knees reach your chest.

original: sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, whose body is the color of gold!

original: 'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bar //
analyzed: 'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bar //
translated: Your feet, marked with wheels and webs,

original: sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs //
analyzed: sa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs //
translated: Proceed, leaving a pattern on the ground.

original: zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i //
analyzed: zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i //
translated: The light from your feet ripens

original: mi rnams gum nas lha yi 'jig rten mchi //🔽chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po //
analyzed: mi rnams gum nas lha yi 'jig rten mchi // chos kyi rgyal po nor bdun sbyin pa po //
translated: And humans, having died, go to the world of the gods.🔽You are the king of Dharma, the bestower of the seven riches,

original: chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs mnga' ba //
translated: The lord of Dharma, with a disciplined mind,

original: chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa //
analyzed: chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa //
translated: Teaching beings through your practice of Dharma.

original: 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, the leader, the lord of Dharma!

original: byams pa'i go che dran pa'i ral gri mchog /
analyzed: byams pa'i go che dran pa'i ral gri mchog /
translated: Your armor of love, your supreme sword of mindfulness,

original: tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'//🔽de yis skye 'chi srid sred 'phel bgyid pa //
analyzed: tshul khrims gzhu dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'// de yis skye 'chi srid sred 'phel bgyid pa //
translated: Morality is the bow, and wisdom is the arrow.🔽With this, the enemy of the afflictions is defeated,

original: nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur //🔽brgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol //
analyzed: nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur // brgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol //
translated: And the craving for existence that increases birth and death.🔽Having crossed, you liberate many beings.

original: grol nas 'ching pa las ni 'gro ba 'grel //🔽bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba //
analyzed: grol nas 'ching pa las ni 'gro ba 'grel // bde gshegs gang gis zhi ba'i gnas mchi ba //
translated: Having been freed, you liberate the world from bondage.🔽You show the path to happiness and freedom from disease,

original: bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston //
analyzed: bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston //
translated: The path that leads to the state of peace, O Sugata.

original: gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing //
analyzed: gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing //
translated: Where there is no birth and no death,

original: 'phral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: 'phral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba //
translated: And where there is no arising of suffering.

original: gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de //
analyzed: gnas mchog zhi ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de //

analyzed: de dag thams cad la rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis khyed nyin mtshan @489a *//

analyzed: skye bo thams cad kyi yongs su spyad pa'i phyir rin po che'i phung po yang bzhag par gyur to //

analyzed: rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu dpyangs so //

analyzed: shang shang te'u rnams 'khod do //

analyzed: ha cang yang mi dkar ba /

analyzed: blta bar mi bya'o // snyam pa'i sems bskyed do //

translated: For ten years, except for the thought, ‘When will I be free from this gathering of enemies?’ and the thought, ‘When will I be able to practice heedfulness and be liberated by it?’ I never grasped at the signs of form.

analyzed: de bzhin du sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to //

analyzed: de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po 'od zer ldan la lha /

analyzed: gzhon nu ni /

original: mi rol to //
analyzed: mi rol to //
translated: does not play,

original: dgyes par mi mdzad do //🔽dgyes rgur mi spyod do //
analyzed: dgyes par mi mdzad do // dgyes rgur mi spyod do //

original: tha ma / yul 'khor skyong /
analyzed: tha ma / yul 'khor skyong /

translated: Then King Arciṣmān, together with eighty thousand kings, went to where Prince Puṇyaraśmi was. Having arrived, tears flowed from his face, his body trembled, and he fell to the ground in sorrow.

analyzed: de sa las langs nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /

analyzed: bu gcig rin chen dam pa nga la ltos shing smros //

original: nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel //
analyzed: nga ni mya ngan gzir te khyim nang sa la 'gyel //
translated: I am overcome with sorrow, fallen to the ground in the house.

original: su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smros //
analyzed: su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la smros //
translated: Who has displeased you? Quickly tell me!

original: de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya //
analyzed: de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya //
translated: I will immediately punish him severely here.

original: khyed kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa //
analyzed: khyed kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang smras pa //
translated: For your sake, I have said with my mind here:

original: lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig /
analyzed: lha yi khyim ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig /
translated: Look at this city, delightful like the palace of the gods!

original: 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smros //
analyzed: 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod de myur smros //
translated: What is missing here? Quickly tell me!

original: brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan //
analyzed: brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan //
translated: Today I will show you the wealth like that of Indra.

original: padma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa //
analyzed: padma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa //
translated: Look at the assembly of women, with eyes like lotus petals, beautiful eyes, afflicted by sorrow,

original: lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos //
analyzed: lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshogs smra ltos //
translated: like celestial maidens, speaking.

original: mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses //🔽ci phyir zug @492a *//
analyzed: mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rtses // ci phyir zug @492a *//
translated: Subdue your sorrow and play with them today.

original: rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug /🔽de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan //
analyzed: rngus zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug / de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan //
translated: Why do you sit with a dejected body, as if in pain?🔽They are skilled in the ways of delight, their voices sweet,

original: glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes //
analyzed: glu dbyangs pheg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes //
translated: with songs and music, knowing the proper times.

original: khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig /
analyzed: khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig /
translated: Your time of joy has come now, do not grieve.

original: padma rnying pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman //
analyzed: padma rnying pa lta bur ci phyir deng lus dman //
translated: Why do you sit with a dejected body, like a withered lotus?

original: me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tshal //
analyzed: me tog 'bras bu yal ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tshal //
translated: A pleasure grove with flowering trees, fruits, branches, and leaves,

original: sna tshogs stong bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra //
analyzed: sna tshogs stong bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra //
translated: like a celestial chariot with a thousand various things.

original: soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin //
analyzed: soms shig khyod kyi na tshod 'di ni thog ma yin //
translated: Think! This is the beginning of your youth.

original: dga' ba'i dus la bab kyi deng 'dir bu dga' gyis; ;khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra //🔽autpa la dang padma dag gi tshal gyis gang //
analyzed: dga' ba'i dus la bab kyi deng 'dir bu dga' gyis; ;khyod kyi khrus chen rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra // autpa la dang padma dag gi tshal gyis gang //
translated: For this great bathing pool of yours is like that of the gods.🔽Filled with ponds of utpala and lotus flowers,

original: padma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan //
analyzed: padma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan //
translated: And with the most intoxicating bees adorning the lotuses,

original: de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed //
analyzed: de la bu soms su zhig 'di la dga' mi byed //
translated: Who would not delight in this, my son?🔽Geese, peacocks, parrots, cuckoos, myna birds,

original: ngang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang // ka la pingka shang shang te'u dang kun la //
analyzed: ngang pa rma bya ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang // ka la pingka shang shang te'u dang kun la //
translated: Kalaviṅka birds, and pheasants—🔽All of them have beautiful voices, like the scent of incense,

original: yid 'ong sgra ldan gang nye spos ngad ldang 'dra ba; ;thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur //
analyzed: yid 'ong sgra ldan gang nye spos ngad ldang 'dra ba; ;thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba thob mi 'gyur //
translated: And anyone who hears them will find joy.

original: gzhal med khang dag mu tig dra ra bcas nor bu btsugs //
analyzed: gzhal med khang dag mu tig dra ra bcas nor bu btsugs //
translated: The palaces are adorned with pearl lattices and jewels,🔽Like the Vaijayanta Palace, adorned with gold and beryl.

original: gser dang bee d'urya spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra; ;rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba //
analyzed: gser dang bee d'urya spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra; ;rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba //
translated: The finest, most excellent jeweled thrones are spread out,

original: gser dril g-yer ka ta la'i phreng ba sgra snyan pa //
analyzed: gser dril g-yer ka ta la'i phreng ba sgra snyan pa //
translated: With golden bells, tinkling bells, and garlands of cymbals.

original: zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags @492b pa; ;khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che //
analyzed: zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags @492b pa; ;khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che //
translated: deep and steady music from the best of instruments.

original: bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa //
analyzed: bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa //
translated: “A thousand girls are singing beautiful songs,

original: dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog /
analyzed: dga' tshal lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog /
translated: like the celestial maidens in Nandana Grove.

original: mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir //
analyzed: mtho ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir //
translated: Why, in this delightful place that is like heaven,

original: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems kyis 'di la dga' mi byed //🔽gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lta bu'i bu 'dra ba //
analyzed: rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems kyis 'di la dga' mi byed // gzhon nu khyod kyi rtsed grogs lta bu'i bu 'dra ba //
translated: do you not enjoy yourself with a distracted mind?🔽“These girls are like your childhood friends;

original: bu mo de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis //
analyzed: bu mo de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis //
translated: play with them, young man!

original: khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug /
analyzed: khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug /
translated: Your father and mother are sitting there, choked with tears.

original: skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci //
analyzed: skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci //
translated: Do you have no compassion for this person who is suffering?🔽“He does not pursue enjoyments that are to be abandoned,

original: 'dus byas yid byung dor ba'i longs spyod don mi gnyer; ;yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa //
analyzed: 'dus byas yid byung dor ba'i longs spyod don mi gnyer; ;yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa //
translated: disgusted with conditioned things. The one who has accumulated good qualities and sees the faults of existence said:

original: 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas //
translated: “Looking at these beings who are caught in the prison of saṃsāra,

original: thar pa don gnyer pha la smras pa yab gson cig /
analyzed: thar pa don gnyer pha la smras pa yab gson cig /
translated: He said to the one who was striving for liberation, Father, listen!

original: lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis //
analyzed: lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis //
translated: No one has done anything unpleasant to me.

original: bdag ni de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags //
analyzed: bdag ni de ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags //
translated: I do not delight in the objects of desire in that way.

original: nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g-yang sar lhung byed pa //
analyzed: nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g-yang sar lhung byed pa //
translated: Those afflictions that cause one to fall into the abyss of the lower realms,

original: sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung //
analyzed: sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung //
translated: all those dear ones are like enemies, not to be followed.

original: mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'//
analyzed: mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dga'//
translated: The unwise, childish people delight in those women,

original: bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g-yang sa che //
analyzed: bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g-yang sa che //
translated: the snares of Mara, the fetters of qualities, the great abyss.

original: rtag tu 'phags ba'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad //
analyzed: rtag tu 'phags ba'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad //
translated: Always despised by the noble ones in that way,

original: sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bstan //
analyzed: sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bstan //
translated: why would I show the root of misery, the hells and lower realms?

original: bud med 'di dag pags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam //🔽bdag ni rus rgyus @493a *//
analyzed: bud med 'di dag pags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam // bdag ni rus rgyus @493a *//
translated: These women are only delightful with the appearance of skin.🔽I do not pursue the meaning of bones,

original: 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer //
analyzed: 'khrul 'khor mi gtsang don mi gnyer //
translated: the machine of flesh, the impurity.

original: khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag /
analyzed: khrag dang gcin dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag /
translated: Exuding blood, urine, impurity, and filth,

original: gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi;; glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi //
analyzed: gsal bar dur khrod 'dra la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi;; glu dang gar dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi //
translated: Do not grasp at song, dance, and the sounds of music.

original: dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid //
analyzed: dga' ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyid //
translated: Delight is like a dream, it confuses the unwise.

original: kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'di brlag gi /
analyzed: kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'di brlag gi /
translated: This is the destruction of the unwise who are attached to conceptualization.

original: ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol //
analyzed: ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol //
translated: Why are you boiling with afflictions like a foolish person?

original: shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na //
analyzed: shing lcug 'di dag thams cad dgun gyi dus byung na //
translated: All these vines and trees

original: dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags //
analyzed: dgon dung shing ltar 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags //
translated: will become like a desert in the winter, and there will be no delight.

original: mi rtag 'di yis dpa' rnams thams cad bshig gyur te //
analyzed: mi rtag 'di yis dpa' rnams thams cad bshig gyur te //
translated: This impermanence destroys all the heroes.

original: srog g-yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur //
analyzed: srog g-yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med gyur //
translated: Though life is fleeting, you are careless because of delusion.

original: sems kyi rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus //
analyzed: sems kyi rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus //
translated: You cannot satisfy the ocean-like mind.

original: srid par rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod //
analyzed: srid par rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dod //
translated: You desire more and more because of the delight in the increase of existence.

original: 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro ba bltas nas su //
analyzed: 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro ba bltas nas su //
translated: Having seen the world killing each other out of desire,

original: 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin //
analyzed: 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin //
translated: here you are like Mount Meru, unshaken by the wind.

original: rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min //
analyzed: rgyal po khyod dang pha dang lhan cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min //
translated: “ ‘Your father, O King, and those born with you, Your relatives, your wife, and the lower realms are not your refuge.

original: bdag cag thams cad rtsva rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: bdag cag thams cad rtsva rtse'i zil pa 'dra ba ste /
translated: All of us are like dew on the tip of a blade of grass.

original: sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod //
analyzed: sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod //
translated: Do not come under the power of the mind! Be careful!

original: mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung //
analyzed: mi dbang dar la bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung //
translated: “ ‘O Lord of Men, youth is impermanent; how can it be acceptable?

original: srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung //
analyzed: srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung //
translated: Life passes quickly, like a mountain river; how can it be acceptable?

original: 'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung //
analyzed: 'dus byas 'di zad glog sprin 'dra ste cir mi rung //
translated: This conditioned existence ends, like a flash of lightning or a cloud; how can it be acceptable?

original: rgyal po mkhas la @493b srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan //
analyzed: rgyal po mkhas la @493b srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan //
translated: “ ‘O wise King, it is bad to be attached to the pleasures of the three existences.

original: lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig /
analyzed: lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig /
translated: The gods tell me, “Be careful!”

original: byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min zhes bskul //
translated: “The bodhisattvas are not attached to objects.”

original: 'jig rten phan pa'i snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi //
analyzed: 'jig rten phan pa'i snying brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi //
translated: I will become a Buddha, compassionate for the benefit of the world.

original: rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags //
analyzed: rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags //
translated: “ ‘Enlightenment is not for a king who acts carelessly.

original: rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g-yen spyo sems 'khol ba //
analyzed: rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g-yen spyo sems 'khol ba //
translated: A king whose mind is disturbed by desire

original: de ni bsod nams chud za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog /
analyzed: de ni bsod nams chud za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog /
translated: It is the destruction of merit and the end of the higher realms.

original: 'tshe ba shin tu rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi //
analyzed: 'tshe ba shin tu rgyags pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi //
translated: I will never engage in violence, which is a great intoxication.

original: skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur //
analyzed: skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin 'gyur //
translated: How can I find relief, like a bird caught in a net?

original: khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra //
analyzed: khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed ma 'dra //
translated: The elements are like snakes, and the aggregates are like executioners.

original: zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs //
analyzed: zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don med grong stong mtshungs //
translated: The contaminated mind is like a useless, empty town.

original: rgyal po 'di ni dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus //
analyzed: rgyal po 'di ni dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus //
translated: This king’s body is like a poisonous tree in full bloom.

original: chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'//
analyzed: chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'//
translated: How can I find joy here, when I am carried away by the rivers?🔽Having seen this world, which is like the sky ablaze with bright flames,

original: rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang / 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas //
analyzed: rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang / 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag bltas nas //
translated: I will liberate those who have entered bad paths,🔽In order to awaken those who are asleep, to heal the sick,

original: rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang // gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsad nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rgyal po de ring 'dir ni de dag dgrol ba dang // gnyid log sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsad nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir //
translated: To uproot the afflictions, and to turn them away from bad paths.

original: bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni rab tu sbyar //
analyzed: bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni rab tu sbyar //
translated: I will set out the ship of the peaceful Dharma.

original: stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas //
analyzed: stong chen du ni bcings pa rnam grol rab bsgrags nas //
translated: And the proclamation of liberation for those bound in the great void,

original: legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi //
analyzed: legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi //
translated: I will satisfy those who are long impoverished by good explanations.

original: ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi //
analyzed: ngan 'gro'i lam du lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bgyi //
translated: I will rescue those who have fallen into the paths of lower realms,

original: long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i @494a *//
analyzed: long ba mig sbyin sred pa'i @494a *//
translated: Giving eyes to the blind,

original: 'khri shing bskam par bgyi //
analyzed: 'khri shing bskam par bgyi //
translated: drying up the vines of craving.

original: rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas //
analyzed: rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar me byas //
translated: For the sake of supreme liberation, I will make a lamp of the light rays of wisdom,

original: de yis srid gsum gar la blta bar 'drar mthong 'gyur //
analyzed: de yis srid gsum gar la blta bar 'drar mthong 'gyur //
translated: By which the three existences will equally see the dance.

original: byams dang snying brtses snying rje pha rol phyin pa'i sprin //
analyzed: byams dang snying brtses snying rje pha rol phyin pa'i sprin //
translated: With love and compassion, the clouds of the perfection of compassion,🔽The rain of the branches of enlightenment, cool and blissful,

original: sems can bde 'brug lha mthong glog gi phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis //
analyzed: sems can bde 'brug lha mthong glog gi phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yis //
translated: With the thunder of the happiness of sentient beings, the garlands of lightning of seeing the gods,

original: 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi //
analyzed: 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi //
translated: I will cool the world, tormented for a long time.

original: rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te //
analyzed: rgyal po bdag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te //
translated: Remembering that, I have come here, O King.

original: bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis //
analyzed: bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod pa kun la smon ma mchis //
translated: I do not aspire to any conditioned desires at all.

original: byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi /
analyzed: byang chub don gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi /
translated: I will practice here for the sake of enlightenment and for the sake of sentient beings.

original: gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis //
analyzed: gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis //
translated: I am not at all attached to existence.

original: rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas //
analyzed: rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas //
translated: What wise person would remain in the midst of enemies?

original: blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pa su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro //
translated: What wise person would travel on a dangerous path?

original: mi dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g-yang sar ltung //
analyzed: mi dang ldan pa su zhig 'di na g-yang sar ltung //
translated: What wise person would fall into a ravine?

original: byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur //
translated: What wise person would be heedless after learning the path to enlightenment?

original: 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro dag ni rgyun zlog pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro dag ni rgyun zlog pa //
translated: I will turn back the current of all beings who are carried away by the current.

original: rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus //
analyzed: rgyal po tshig tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus //
translated: O King, enlightenment is not attained merely by words.

original: lhun po'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchong spro yi //
analyzed: lhun po'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchong spro yi //
translated: I would rather jump from the peak of Mount Meru into the ocean

original: bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min //
analyzed: bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min //
translated: than delight in sensual pleasures here.

original: rgyal po dam pa rang gnyer thabs cig myur du bzhud //
analyzed: rgyal po dam pa rang gnyer thabs cig myur du bzhud //
translated: O King, quickly leave alone and alone.

original: yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol //
analyzed: yul 'khor dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol //
translated: Give all the delightful lands to the world.

original: gang bdag bsam pa @494b ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang bdag bsam pa @494b ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur //
translated: Take me as you wish and leave.

original: yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags //
analyzed: yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags //
